description:
This is a collection of basic boolean logic tasks with two variables. In moste cases you must build logical clauses with 'and' and 'or' to achive the correct outcome .
Pay attention to the information you are given and write logic that conforms to the variables you are given and the end goal

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if both variables A and B are true
tasks.info: The logical AND operator (&&) returns true if both operands are true.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is false if either variable C or D is false
tasks.info: The logical AND operator (&&) returns false if either operand is false.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if variable E is true and variable F is false
tasks.info: The logical NOT operator (!) inverts the value of a variable.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is false if variable G is false and variable H is true
tasks.info: The logical NOT operator (!) inverts the value of a variable.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if variable I is false and variable J is false
tasks.info: The logical NOT operator (!) inverts the value of a variable.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if variable K is true and variable L is not false
tasks.info: The logical AND operator (&&) returns true if both operands are true.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is false if variable M is not true and variable N is not false
tasks.info: The logical AND operator (&&) returns false if either operand is false.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if variable O is not false and variable P is not true
tasks.info: The logical NOT operator (!) inverts the value of a variable.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is false if variable Q is not false and variable R is true
tasks.info: The logical AND operator (&&) returns false if either operand is false.

tasks.description: Write a statement that is true if variable S is not true and variable T is not true
tasks.info: The logical NOT operator (!) inverts the value of a variable.
